name: Dolores ROMINE and Legion Insurance Company, v. RPS, INC., formerly known as Roadway Package System, Inc. Petition of Legion Insurance Company

parties: Dolores ROMINE and Legion Insurance Company, v. RPS, INC., formerly known as Roadway Package System, Inc. Petition of Legion Insurance Company.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM. '
AND NOW, this 31st day of January, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. This matter is REVERSED and REMANDED for reconsideration in light of this court’s decision in Thompson v. WCAB, 566 Pa. 420, 781 A.2d 1146 (2001).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM. '

casebody.head_matter:
788 A.2d 370
Dolores ROMINE and Legion Insurance Company, v. RPS, INC., formerly known as Roadway Package System, Inc. Petition of Legion Insurance Company.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 31, 2002.
